thread.section_title: Initial Hygiene IE Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Initial Hygiene IE | www.initial.ie
thread.title: Trish Tuohy
thread.title_full: Initial Hygiene IE reviewed by Trish Tuohy

author: Trish Tuohy
title: Trish Tuohy
text: I own a hairdressers and we use this company to come once a week for the mats on the entrance of the salon every week they come and take the mats away to clean them and leave a replacement, we have been using this service for a couple of years and it works so well for us, very reasonable and very efficient, our delivery man Chris is wonderful so friendly and efficient always a smile and a kind word for us. Delighted with this service
